profile.label: Profile
profile.value: A certified Salesforce Developer with proven ability in developing custom solutions on the Salesforce platform to meet business needs. A proactive problem-solver with a collaborative mindset, an eagerness to learn, and a passion for delivering results.

positions.description:
- Supported the Salesforce Financial Service Cloud and Experience Cloud production environments of a banking institution.
- Analyzed logs to determine root cause of issues and provided analysis reports and test documentation.
- Proactively coordinated with business and development teams to promptly identify and escalate challenges, improving team collaboration and reducing the time to resolve issues.
- Improved the team's Excel sheet tracker which reduced accuracy errors and time to create reports.

- Collaborated closely with Team Lead to build and configure declarative and programmatic Salesforce solutions, including Apex Classes, Apex Triggers, and Batch Classes.
- Created Users, Roles, Public Groups and implemented role hierarchies and sharing rules to manage record access among different users.
- Wrote unit test cases to cover positive and negative use cases for Apex classes and triggers maintaining overall code coverage > 90%.
- Developed an Apex web service that serves data to the client's external systems which reduced manual work and ensured the accuracy and the timeliness of data.
- Performed deployments using Change Sets, Workbench, and Gearset and served as the delegate for sprint release deployments to the integration sandbox.

- Automated regression tests by learning Robot Framework with minimal training.
- Reduced outdated regression test scripts by 60% through an improvement initiative.
- Continuously met 100% execution rate per cycle by planning the test strategy. Eased progress tracking by creating dashboard.
